name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James Wesley MILLER, Appellant

OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.

365 A.2d 1251
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James Wesley MILLER, Appellant.
